localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: IOON is an innovative technology that helps you turn drinking water into a sanitizer with help of silver particles. It is safe for kids, pets, people with allergies and can be even used on food. It’s portable, stylish and you can recycle it!
blogPost.body: IOON is an innovative technology that helps you turn drinking water into a sanitizer with help of silver particles. It is safe for kids, pets, people with allergies and can be even used on food. It’s portable, stylish and you can recycle it!
blogPost.title: IOON - Smart device that turns water into sanitizer.
blogPost.author: Pavlo Pedenko

localize.description: IOON是一项创新技术，在银粒子的帮助下，它可以帮助你将饮用水变成消毒剂。它对儿童、宠物和过敏者都是安全的，甚至可以用在食物上。它是便携的，时髦的，你可以回收利用！
localize.tagline: 把水变成消毒剂的智能设备。

localize.description: IOON是一項創新技術，在銀粒子的幫助下，它可以幫助你將飲用水變成消毒劑。它對兒童、寵物和過敏者都是安全的，甚至可以用在食物上。它是便攜的，時髦的，你可以回收利用！
localize.tagline: 把水變成消毒劑的智能設備。

previous.title:
Sen. Bernie Sanders said Monday he plans to filibuster the Senate’s vote to overturn Trump’s veto of the defense spending bill, unless Majority Leader Mitch McConnell agrees to vote on a bill to raise individuals’ stimulus payments to $2,000.
https://t.co/gA6Se7nghR

localize.full_text:
参议员桑德斯周一表示，他计划阻挠参议院推翻特朗普否决国防开支法案的投票，除非多数党领袖米奇·麦康奈尔(Mitch McConnell)同意就一项将个人刺激支出提高到2,000美元的法案进行投票。
https://t.co/gA6Se7nghR

參議員桑德斯週一表示，他計劃阻撓參議院推翻特朗普否決國防開支法案的投票，除非多數黨領袖米奇·麥康奈爾(Mitch McConnell)同意就一項將個人刺激支出提高到2,000美元的法案進行投票。
https://t.co/gA6Se7nghR
